data.question: What is the empirical formula of TOF-16?
At what temperature (K) was the crystallographic data for TOF-16 collected?
What is the space group of TOF-16?
What is the BET surface area of TOF-16?
What type of radiation was used to irradiate TOF-16 in the study?
What is the highest dose of γ-irradiation TOF-16 was exposed to in the study?
What change in color was observed in TOF-16 crystals after γ-irradiation?
data.answer: Change to dark red or brown

data.question: Did TOF-16 maintain its crystallinity after being exposed to 4 MGy of γ-irradiation?
What was the highest dose of He2+ ion irradiation TOF-16 was exposed to?
At what dose of He2+ ion irradiation did TOF-16 start to lose its crystallinity?
Is TOF-16 more resistant to γ-irradiation or He2+ ion irradiation?
Did TOF-16 become X-ray amorphous after 24 hours of exposure to air?
What was the main method used to characterize the radiation damage in TOF-16?
What was the effect of soaking TOF-16 in 5 M HNO3 for approximately 24 hours?
Did TOF-16 show a significant change in FT-IR spectra after γ-irradiation?
What was the main purpose of using density functional theory (DFT) calculations in the study?
data.answer: To predict vibrational modes of the binaphthol linker

data.question: What was the main finding regarding the radiation resistance of TOF-16?
data.answer: TOF-16 is remarkably robust during γ-irradiation and survived all doses studied

data.question: What was the effect of supercritical CO2 activation on TOF-16?
data.answer: No change to bulk material as indicated by PXRD

data.question: What was the total pore volume of TOF-16 as determined by BET analysis?
What was the main conclusion regarding the design of radiation resistant MOFs based on the study?
data.answer: Properties other than absorbance cross section of the metal in the SBU and chemical stability of the framework play an important role in a MOF’s stability under exposure to high doses of ionizing radiation
